scripts.db:push: npm run with:dev -- prisma db push
scripts.db:push:prd: npm run with:prd -- prisma db push
scripts.db:push:prd:force: npm run with:prd -- prisma db push --accept-data-loss
scripts.db:reset: npm run with:dev -- prisma migrate reset
scripts.db:reset:skip-seed: npm run with:dev -- prisma migrate reset --skip-seed
scripts.migrate:deploy: npm run with:prd -- prisma migrate deploy
scripts.migrate:dev: npm run with:dev -- prisma migrate dev
scripts.migrate:status: npm run with:dev -- prisma migrate status
scripts.migrate:status:prd: npm run with:prd -- prisma migrate status
scripts.pull:env:dev: doppler secrets download --project portfolio-prisma --config dev --no-file --format env > ./.env.development.local
scripts.pull:env:lcl: doppler secrets download --project portfolio-prisma --config lcl --no-file --format env > ./.env.test.local
scripts.pull:env:prd: doppler secrets download --project portfolio-prisma --config prd --no-file --format env > ./.env.production.local
